00277     def CreateWorkspaceBrowser(self):
00278         tree = wx.TreeCtrl(self, -1, wx.Point(0, 0), wx.Size(160, 250),
00279                            wx.TR_DEFAULT_STYLE | wx.NO_BORDER)
00280         root = tree.AddRoot("AUI Project")
00281         items = []
00282         imglist = wx.ImageList(16, 16, True, 2)
00283         imglist.Add(wx.ArtProvider_GetBitmap(wx.ART_FOLDER, wx.ART_OTHER, wx.Size(16,16)))
00284         imglist.Add(wx.ArtProvider_GetBitmap(wx.ART_NORMAL_FILE, wx.ART_OTHER, wx.Size(16,16)))
00285         tree.AssignImageList(imglist)
00286         items.append(tree.AppendItem(root, "Item 1", 0))
00287         items.append(tree.AppendItem(root, "Item 2", 0))
00288         for ii in xrange(len(items)):
00289             id = items[ii]
00290             tree.AppendItem(id, "Subitem 1", 1)
00291             tree.AppendItem(id, "Subitem 2", 1)
00292         tree.Expand(root)
00293         return tree

00295     def CreateSizeReportCtrl(self, width=80, height=80):
00296         return SizeReportCtrl(self, -1, wx.DefaultPosition, wx.Size(width, height), self._mgr_mgr)

00298     def OnLoadColumnFile(self, event):
00299         import os
00300         wildcard = "All files (*)|*"
00301         dlg = wx.FileDialog(
00302             self, message="Choose a file",
00303             defaultDir=os.getcwd(), 
00304             defaultFile="",
00305             wildcard=wildcard,
00306             style=wx.OPEN | wx.MULTIPLE | wx.CHANGE_DIR)
00307         
00308         # Show the dialog and retrieve the user response. If it is the OK response, 
00309         # process the data.
00310         if dlg.ShowModal() == wx.ID_OK:
00311             # This returns a Python list of files that were selected.
00312             paths = dlg.GetPaths()
00313             #parse the files
00314             for file in paths:
00315                 x,y=self.extractColumnsextractColumnsextractColumns(file)
00316                 self.backendWrapbackendWrap.addLine(x, y)    
00317         dlg.Destroy()
00318             
00319     def extractColumns(self,filename):
00320         'gets the columns from a file and returns them as arrays'
00321         f=file(filename,'r')
00322         lines=f.readlines()
00323         x=[];y=[]
00324         for line in lines:
00325             if line[0]=="#":continue 
00326             words=line.split()
00327             x.append(float(words[0]))
00328             y.append(float(words[1]))
00329 #            from decimal import Decimal
00330 #            x.append(float(Decimal(eval(words[0]))))
00331 #            y.append(float(Decimal(eval(words[1]))))
00332         import numpy as nx
00333         return nx.array(x),nx.array(y)

00367     def OnSettings(self, event):
00368         # show the settings pane, and float it
00369         floating_pane = self._mgr_mgr.GetPane("settings").Float().Show()
00370         if floating_pane.floating_pos == wx.DefaultPosition:
00371             floating_pane.FloatingPosition(self.GetStartPositionGetStartPositionGetStartPosition())
00372         self._mgr_mgr.Update()
00373                 
00374     def OnCreatePerspective(self, event):
00375         dlg = wx.TextEntryDialog(self, "Enter a name for the new perspective:", "AUI Test")
00376         dlg.SetValue(("Perspective %d")%(len(self._perspectives_perspectives)+1))
00377         if dlg.ShowModal() != wx.ID_OK:
00378             return
00379         if len(self._perspectives_perspectives) == 0:
00380             self._perspectives_menu_perspectives_menu.AppendSeparator()
00381         self._perspectives_menu_perspectives_menu.Append(ID_FirstPerspective + len(self._perspectives_perspectives), dlg.GetValue())
00382         self._perspectives_perspectives.append(self._mgr_mgr.SavePerspective())
00383 
00384     def OnCopyPerspective(self, event):
00385         s = self._mgr_mgr.SavePerspective()
00386         if wx.TheClipboard.Open():
00387             wx.TheClipboard.SetData(wx.TextDataObject(s))
00388             wx.TheClipboard.Close()
00389         
00390     def OnRestorePerspective(self, event):
00391         self._mgr_mgr.LoadPerspective(self._perspectives_perspectives[event.GetId() - ID_FirstPerspective])
00392 
00393     def GetStartPosition(self):
00394         self.xx = self.xx + 20
00395         x = self.xx
00396         pt = self.ClientToScreen(wx.Point(0, 0))
00397         return wx.Point(pt.x + x, pt.y + x)

00401 def runGraphics():
00402     # Make a frame to show it
00403     app = wx.PySimpleApp()
00404     frame = MainPlotWindow(None, wx.ID_ANY, "Graphics", size=(1110, 590))
00405     #frame = wx.Frame(None,-1,'Plottables')
00406     #plotter = Plotter(frame)
00407     frame.Show()
00408     app.MainLoop()
00409 
00410 if __name__ == "__main__":
00411     runGraphics()
